participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

reshist_addr1_eff_nalcop.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if any state co-prescribing nalaxone policy was effective at date of baseline visit (address 1)

reshist_addr1_eff_all.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if state co-prescribing nalaxone policy was effective for all patients at date of baseline visit (address 1)

reshist_addr2_eff_nalcop.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if any state co-prescribing nalaxone policy was effective at date of baseline visit (address 2)

reshist_addr2_eff_all.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if state co-prescribing nalaxone policy was effective for all patients at date of baseline visit (address 2)

reshist_addr3_eff_nalcop.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if any state co-prescribing nalaxone policy was effective at date of baseline visit (address 3)

reshist_addr3_eff_all.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if state co-prescribing nalaxone policy was effective for all patients at date of baseline visit (address 3)
